Your tagline should be short and snappy, summarizing what you do.
Things to ask yourself when writing your tagline:

What are you? A designer? A writer? A developer?
I am an Android Developer.

What do you do? Design websites? Develop games?
  I love to creating Android applications. My ultimate goal is to create beautiful
  Android applications with the end user in mind.
//I love to work on Android applications of all types.

//Whether it be business related or for fun.

Where are you from? Country? City?
I am from Austin Texas

Are you a freelancer or do you work for a studio? Are you looking for work?
I graduated from Texas State University with a Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
